item.title: Dealing with forms in ASP.Net MVC without using JavaScript
item.description: In the era of JavaScript it's a good idea to support users that aren't getting JavaScript enhancements, specially if you work for UK's goverment. If you are using simple forms you don't have any problems, but as long as you start adding complexity to your page supporting this scenario can be a bit tricky. Obviously your first thought should be: "Can I provide a similar experience using a less complex view?

item.title: Test Driving ASP.Net routing
item.description: In this article we will see how can we test drive the routing configuration of an ASP.Net web application.
